PageActionDefaultTitle.message:
Start or stop subtitle speaking
(Right-click on the setting and select "Options")

OptionsPageSampleTextValue.message: If I speak in the tongues of men or of angels, but do not have love, I am only a resounding gong or a clanging cymbal.

OptionsPageDonateText.message: You can support CaptionSpeaker by donating:

OptionsPageIsRateMaxStrechTextWarning.message: Some speakers may not be able to read aloud if a certain speed is set, or the speed setting may be ignored.Therefore, after turning this option ON, always perform a reading test and confirm that reading is performed as intended. please.
